#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
char s[1000001];
ll z[1000001];
ll cnt[1000001];
int main()
{

	ll i,j,k,l,m,n;

	scanf("%lld",&n);
	scanf("%s",s);
	scanf("%lld",&m);
    ll L = 0, R = 0;
    for(i=0;i<1000001;i++)
    	cnt[i]=0;
    	z[0]=n;
    for (i = 1; i < n; i++)
    {
	    if (i > R)
	    {
	    L = R = i;
	    while (R < n && s[R-L] == s[R]) R++;
	    z[i] = R-L; R--;
	    }
	    else
	    {
	    k = i-L;
	    if (z[k] < R-i+1) z[i] = z[k];
	    else
	    {
	      L = i;
	      while (R < n && s[R-L] == s[R]) R++;
	      z[i] = R-L; R--;
	    }
	    }
    }
    //cout<<"hi"<<endl;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
      //cout<<z[i]<<" ";
	}
	//cout<<endl;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
      cnt[z[i]]++;
	}
	ll sum=0;
	for(i=n;i>=0;i--)
	{
		//cout<<cnt[i]<<endl;
		sum=sum+cnt[i];
		//cout<<sum<<endl;
		if(sum>=m)
		{
		cout<<i<<endl;
		for(j=0;j<i;j++)
		cout<<s[j];
		break;
		}
	}

    return 0;
}
